name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here before our flight to South America and upon our return. This is very similar to other Hilton Garden Inn hotels. The rooms were nice. The airport shuttle was on time. The only disappointment was that the bathroom only had a shower, no tub. Other than that this is a great place to stay near the airport and they allowed me to leave my car for 10 days with no additional fees, since I was staying when I returned. This saved a lot of money.
reviews.title: Stayed Twice in September 2011

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the second time we stayed here. This trip our room, especially bathroom was DIRTY! I took a clean wet wash cloth and wiped step into shower and came away with black moldy dirt...ewwwww. If I hadn't needed a shower so badly after an international flight I wouldn't have taken one...I really considered not getting one. The blanket cover and bed skirt were dirty but the sheets were clean. Clearly the housekeeping supervisor is not monitoring what staff is or is not doing. Will never stay here again.
reviews.title: Ewwwww...dirty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: Very nice place, good facilities, outstanding staff that is willing to help and make your stay more enjoyable.
reviews.title: Very Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night after missed flight because of AA. Was suppose to stay at Hampton Inn Blue Lagoon, but the shuttle driver turned us off by his uncaring, rude behaviour. So we ended up at this property. This hotel is clean, new, breakfast was good, front desk helpful and courteous. No complaints.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: This hotel was clean, the service was great; however, the bed was terrible. It was like sleeping on concrete, my boy friend I checked out two days earlier and checked into a different hotel
reviews.title: Just okay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Got to the hotel in a rainy day and my GPS took me to the backdoor and I call to the operator in order to open up, they said simply not possible because our security employees can get wet!!! I drove extra 10 mins to get in the main entrance and two days later somebody broke in to my rented car, surely the security guy can´t get wet and the bad guys of course does!
reviews.title: Good but with a glitch in the service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stayed here because I had a very early flight out of the Miami airport. I have no complaints at all. Rooms are nice and clean ; although nothing to write home about if you know what I mean. Staff are friendly and there is a shuttle to/from the airport. Free internet in the rooms is included. There are a few restaurants right the other side of the street; very convenient for when you don't feel like eating at the hotel. This hotel is a bit farther from the airport than some of the other properties, but shuttle time we are only talking about 3-4 minutes more, so not a big deal. Would stay again.
reviews.title: Great for early MIA flights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a pretty expensive one , but we got it at basically half price through expedia and we were very happy with it. We checked in pretty late after a long drive from Orlando and we were stuck outside. Thankfully someone staying at the hotel was able to let us in while we were waiting in the lobby calling for someone at the front desk for a while after that we checked into 2 rooms (mom also joined us in Miami) and both rooms very beautiful however our room smelled horribly of smoke, even though it is said to be a non- smoking room. It was late so we didn't want to go through the hassle of changing our room. the next day we had someone just spray air-freshener around the room , as when we went to ask for a room change they had no more available rooms and the next day would have been our last. Overall the service was fine and the rooms are very clean and comfy. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011
reviews.text: The location is close to the airport and there are fast foods and convenience stores close, besides that, you will need a car or taxi to get around the city.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011
reviews.text: The hotel offers free shuttle from and to the airport and to one of the malls.
reviews.title: Hilton Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stayed here for an entire week on business and definitely enjoyed my stay. This is a newer property, so everything at this hotel is modern and nice. The rooms are very clean and the bed is comfortable. The hotel offers free internet, free parking, and has an outdoor hot tub and pool. The fitness center has a nice selection of equipment and met my needs. The only negative about this hotel is the location. It's adjacent to an industrial area and is located right in the path of a runway. Planes do fly directly overhead from time to time and may produce some jet noise in the rooms, although I didn't find the noise to be that bad. For some reason this hotel considers it an upgrade to get a room facing the airport and downtown.....all you really see is an industrial park so avoid paying for the upgrade and hope you get a pool view instead. I had a car and could drive to shopping and restaurants, but if you stay here without a vehicle you might feel trapped. I would definitely stay here again if the price is right.
reviews.title: Newer HGI located near the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We cannot understand the amazing reviews for this hotel. The staff at this hotel was very friendly, but it did not make up for the poor quality of the food, the uncomfortable beds and the awful location. The room service meal we ordered was cold and tasteless (they also forgot something and asked us to come down and get it!) The breakfast buffet, which cost $12, was worse than the complimentary meals we usually receive at comparable hotels; my husband and I both thought the eggs were the worst we ever had. Moreover, the beds were not very comfortable and the compressor on our mini-refrigerator was so loud that it woke us up several times in the night. Also, the location of the hotel is only good if you need to be at the airport very early in the morning, but it sounds at though the shuttle is not reliable. The hotel is right in the landing path of the airport. Planes fly directly over the hotel (only a couple hundred of feet above the building). Finally, the hotel is not that close to any nice area, it is also not well marked from the road and it is dangerous to get in and out of; you risk life and limb trying to walk anywhere. Other than the great desk staff, we found the hotel sub-par. Sorry guys.
reviews.title: Nice Staff-Lousy Food, Beds and Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night to catch an early morning flight. We had a rental car, so I can't say anything about their shuttle service. But we found it very easy to get back to the car rental return. The room was wonderful. One of the best I've ever stayed in. The woman at the front desk was extremely nice and very helpful. When I had trouble printing our boarding pass in the business center. She did it for me. She was quick to offer suggestions for dinner. We were too tired to go out and take her up on her suggestion, which was a shame because the Cuban restaurant she mentioned sounded good. We just ordered something there and took it to our room. Good food. And plenty of it. We ordered a sandwich to share and it was more than enough for the two of us. If I had to fly through Miami again with a layover, I would stay here.
reviews.title: Good location for early morning flight.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel during a recent conference and it was quite pleasant! The hotel is just located off the airport so it's a good 10-15 minute drive, not to mention the hotel does offer complimentary shuttle service.
reviews.title: Great Hotel with friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel is fairly new, I'd say it's about 2-3 years old as it looked and even smelled quite fresh. The decor was very modern and contemporary throughout the hotel.
reviews.title: Not worth it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for two night in November 2011. We were post-cruise and enjoying a couple of days visiting friends in Miami before flying out of MIA. We had originally booked at the Homewood Suites next door, but upon check in were told we got moved due to overbooking. That was perfectly fine with me.
reviews.title: Great location and service for short visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I found the hotel to be comfortable, clean, conveniently located to all major freeways and the service was cordial and accommodating. Big points for one of the most delicious breakfasts I've ever eaten, seriously. Have the belgian waffle with banana and blueberries. We were comped breakfast for two mornings by the General Manager.
reviews.title: Great night's stay at a classy hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am a Hilton Employee, so I am not sure if breakfast is included in the room rate, but I am fairly sure it is. I was on a special rate and originally upon check-in we were not offered breakfast, but it was given to me later and I appreciate the gesture.
reviews.title: Decent hotel, not convenient to airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel also has free internet, a small but efficient workout room and a pool.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay at Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Miami Beach both days and were there in less than 15 minutes. We also drove surface streets from Coral Gables and were at the hotel in less than 15 minutes. It's not a beautiful Miami Beach oceanfront hotel, but it was perfectly fine for a short stay.
reviews.title: A pleasant stay

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West Hotel Miami
